scripts.deploy_bsc_production: cp ./src/multiChain/constantsBSC.ts ./src/constants.ts && graph codegen subgraphs/bsc.yaml && graph deploy --product hosted-service woonetwork/woofi
scripts.deploy_bsc_staging: cp ./src/multiChain/constantsBSC.ts ./src/constants.ts && graph codegen subgraphs/bsc.yaml && graph deploy --product hosted-service merlincdj/woofi-staging
scripts.deploy_bsc_testing: cp ./src/multiChain/constantsBSC.ts ./src/constants.ts && graph codegen subgraphs/bsc.yaml && graph deploy --product hosted-service merlincdj/woofi-testing
